creator: cheiser@cais.net
text:
The Makefile.freebsd does not work under FreeBSD.  If failes to compile all the 
jk code under ../jk  

Therefore, you get unresolved symbols when apache attempts to start.

Modifing the Makefile.linux with appropriate values solved this problem.  
Please correct the Makefile.freebsd

This is solved ( I hope ) in jakarta-tomcat-connectors, where JFC added
.configure support.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
